item.title: AO Archive: Transitioning from GUI Editors to Vim
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2017/09/18/vim-essentials/ This was my very first blog post written at Atomic Object! A lot of Atoms use vim â€“ sometimes inside of an IDE like VS Code, and sometimes just in a shell. My first project was lead by Mike Swieton, who is a bit of a vim expert. He taught me a lot of the basics, and then I used various online materials to learn the rest of what I know.
